long_description: The K2 Darko Boa snowboard boots bring lightweight comfort to your freestyle scene. With a supportive yet flexible fit, you'll quickly elevate your park game. Darko spotlight features include traditional boot lacing, Boa(R) Conda liner lacing and Harshmellow shock absorbers. Intuition(TM) Control-Foam 3D stitched liners feature dual-density Ultralon(R), a flexible thermal-formable EVA foam designed to resist pressure-related pack out. Internal and external J-bars hold heels securely; supportive liner bottoms include molded EVA insoles with Harshmellow pods for extra damping and support. K2 Boa Conda liner lacing system allows on-the-fly control of ankle support and heel hold while the shells are still fully laced by external Boa reels. Smooth-functioning Boa reels anchor shells and liners together for perfect alignment; harness lacing through the floating tongue allows a personalized fit. Microarticulated cuffs and 3D-formed tongues are supportive and durable. Grip-Light outsoles combine Phylon with targeted areas of rubber and cushioned Harshmellow for lightweight comfort and superb traction.
short_description: The K2 Darko Boa snowboard boots bring lightweight comfort to your freestyle scene. With a supportive yet flexible fit, you'll quickly elevate your park game.
